titles.title: Expressing support for a whole child approach to education and recognizing the role of parents, educators, and community members in providing a whole child approach to education for each student.
Expressing support for a whole child approach to education and recognizing the role of parents, educators, and community members in providing a whole child approach to education for each student.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for a whole child approach to education and encourages parents, educators, and community members to support this approach for each student.
